name: Fly Fighter Simulator - USA Army Sky
name_original: Fly Fighter Simulator - USA Army Sky
description:
Fly Fighter Simulator - USA Army Sky s the fun, exciting, new jet fighter plane attack mission based flight simulation. Take to the sky in super realistic army fighter jet airplanes.
Early on in game, missions start off easy, like basic training to fly the army fighter jets and getting used to controlling the airplanes.
As you progress through this army jet flight simulation, missions get harder, testing your fighter jet flying skills in order to complete the missions!
